MIT Atomistic Parallel Package

Molecular Dynamics (MD) module

class mapp.md.atoms¶

I will add doc here

Attributes

B matrix of reciprocal unitcell vectors
H matrix of unitcell vectors
comm_coords coordinates of calling process in cartesian structure
comm_dims number of processes for each cartesian dimension
comm_rank rank of the calling process in the communicator
comm_size size of the group associated with the communicator
elems dictionary of elements present in the system
h Planck constant
kB Boltzmann constant
skin skin size
step step number
vol volume of unitcell

ff_lj(eps, sigma, r_c, shift=False)¶

Lennard-Jones potential

Parameters:

eps: array_like

sigma: array_like

r_c: array_like

shift: bool

shift the tail if set to True

mapp.md.cfg()¶

this function reads cfg file and returns an atoms_md object

class mapp.md.min_cg¶

conjugate gradient minimization

Attributes

H_dof unitcell degrees of freedom
affine set to true if transformation is affine
e_tol energy tolerance criterion for stopping minimization
max_dx maximum displacement
ntally tally thermodynamic quantities every ntally steps

Methods

run run energy minimization
H_dof¶

unitcell degrees of freedom

affine¶

set to true if transformation is affine

e_tol¶

energy tolerance criterion for stopping minimization

max_dx¶

maximum displacement

ntally¶

tally thermodynamic quantities every ntally steps

run()¶

run energy minimization

class mapp.md.min_lbfgs¶

l-BFGS minimization

Attributes

H_dof unitcell degrees of freedom
affine set to true if transformation is affine
e_tol energy tolerance criterion for stopping minimization
m number of vectors to store in memory
max_dx maximum displacement
ntally tally thermodynamic quantities every ntally steps

Methods

run run energy minimization
m¶

number of vectors to store in memory

class mapp.md.muvt¶

MD of canonical ensemble

Attributes

T external temperature of simulation
dt timestep of MD simulation
gas_element gcmc element
nattempts number of deletion/insertion attempts
nchains number of chains in Nose-Hoover chain thermostat
nevery perform deletion/insertion attempts every nevery steps
niters number of iterations in Nose-Hoover chain thermostat
ntally tally thermodynamic quantities every ntally steps
seed gcmc random seed
t_relax thermostat parameter, relaxation time

Methods

run run simulation for n steps
gas_element¶

gcmc element

nattempts¶

number of deletion/insertion attempts

nevery¶

perform deletion/insertion attempts every nevery steps

seed¶

gcmc random seed

class mapp.md.nst¶

MD of isothermal–isobaric ensemble

Attributes

S external stress of isothermal–isobaric ensemble
S_dof
T external temperature of simulation
dt timestep of MD simulation
nchains number of chains in Nose-Hoover chain thermostat
nchains_baro number of chains in Nose-Hoover chain thermostat
niters number of iterations in Nose-Hoover chain thermostat
niters_baro number of iterations in Nose-Hoover chain thermostat
nreset number of steps to reset initial conf
ntally tally thermodynamic quantities every ntally steps
t_relax thermostat parameter, relaxation time
t_relax_S t_relax of external stress of isothermal–isobaric ensemble
t_relax_baro thermostat parameter, relaxation time

Methods

run run simulation for n steps

external stress of isothermal–isobaric ensemble

S_dof¶
nchains_baro¶

number of chains in Nose-Hoover chain thermostat

niters_baro¶

number of iterations in Nose-Hoover chain thermostat

nreset¶

number of steps to reset initial conf

t_relax_S¶

t_relax of external stress of isothermal–isobaric ensemble

t_relax_baro¶

thermostat parameter, relaxation time
